author: felicity
msg: test rules should start with a T_

author: quinlan
msg: add code for T_NO_DNS_FOR_RECIPS_* to detect cases where one or more
addresses in recipient list do not have DNS records (meaning they are
likely to be old addresses in spammer databases)
also add some code to better support qmail for T_MSG_ID_ADDED_BY_MTA_*

author: zelgadis
msg: Bug #1583: mass-check: specify which rules to run on command line
